Release History
===============

Next Release
------------

`1.0.1`_ (2015-04-30)
---------------------

* Don't log the payload in the DEBUG level logs, causes an encoding error when it's not ascii


`1.0.0`_ (2015-03-30)
---------------------

* Initial release of the sharded redis connection.
